## ContractPrimarySale.setRecipient() method

Set the primary sale recipient

**Signature:**

```typescript
setRecipient(recipient: string): Promise<TransactionResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  recipient | string | the wallet address |
